DarkMouse::

"Sure, I'll give you all the codes you need. But I want KitKat to 
have a proper funeral. One Befitting a pred leader." She walked over 
and looked at KitKat. "She wasn't the greatest leader, but she was 
good.  She wasn't one to just kill her team off, or send them out to 
get killed." She turned and glared at Megatron.  She would never 
frgive him for sending her to her death as he did. She turned and 
walked to Killfest. "Honor her and I'll be loyal to you. Now and 
always."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest smiles. This was very good. "Excellent," he says as his 
group 
> moves between DarkMouse and the other Predacons in the room. If she 
> knew what she said she knew, she was too valuable to lose.
> 
> "You don't suppose you can give me control of the base? A leader 
must 
> me able to control his lair..."
> 
>
